items.title: Welcome to Semay
items.content_md:
Semay is an offline-first directory and coordination layer for the Horn of Africa.

This library is distributed as small packs so it works fully offline.

items.title: How to Contribute
items.content_md:
1. Open Map
2. Long-press where the place is
3. Add name/type/description
4. Approve nearby places when you are there
